Nylon Air Line (to air spring) into Push to Connect Elbow Fitting (Item 6) at bottom of Passenger Side Air Spring (Bag), (Figure 105)
Securely press into Push to Connect Elbow Fitting at bottom of passenger side air spring (Bag) until it bottoms.
Push twice to verify the air line is inserted past the collet and O-ring.
Pull on air line to verify it is fully inserted.
